title: Star’s final photo before death revealed
content: The staff of Richard Simmons have shared the final photo the legendary fitness guru had prepared to share on social media just before his death. Richard Simmons’ staff gave his fans one last memory of the late star. The employees of the fitness instructor took to Twitter to share the final photo and post he made before he was found dead on July 13. “From Richard’s staff: Hello everyone. title: 90s TV star found dead at home aged 51
content: A former star of a popular long-running US soap opera has been found dead at home, a day after she’s suspected to have died. Esta TerBlanche, a former star of popular US soap All My Children, has died at the age of 51. The actress passed away unexpectedly at her North Hollywood, California, home, her goddaughter, Barbie Ashley, confirmed to TMZ today. Per the outlet, medical professionals suspect she had been dead for about a day before her body was recovered. TerBlanche’s publicist, Lisa Rodrigo, also anno...

title: Hollywood legend touches down in Aus
content: A Hollywood legend who starred in one of the best science fiction films of all time is among the star-studded line-up headlining Australia’s biggest pop culture event. Legendary Hollywood actor Robert Patrick is in Sydney to meet fans at Australia’s biggest pop culture convention Supanova, being held at Sydney Olympic Park this weekend. Mr Patrick is well known for his villainous role as the fully autonomous robot T1000 in the action-packed film Terminator 2: Judgement Day, starring alongside Arnold Schwarz...

title: Radio star exposes brutal dating reality
content: From ghosting to a seven-minute voice message, radio personality Bianca Dye reveals the reality of modern dating in her 50s. The world can be split between people who agree or disagree with having pineapple on a pizza, taking a screaming child into a fancy restaurant or shagging on the first date. (Don’t ask for my opinion on any of those as you will judge me.) But the latest debate dividing people: Is it OK or not OK to leave a voice message instead of calling or writing a text? title: Star’s surprising red carpet footwear
content: Brooke Shields absolutely radiated at the Tony Awards in a yellow dress, but it was her equally bright footwear that turned heads. Brooke Shields absolutely radiated at the Tony Awards in New York on Sunday night, local time.  But it wasn’t her sequined bright yellow Monique Lhuillier gown that was the talk of the event. Rather, the actress’ surprising choice of footwear: a practical pair of equally bright yellow Crocs. “I got my Crocs! I couldn’t do this in heels!” the actress told People magazine on the r...

content: Months after making worldwide headlines, Molly the Magpie and Peggy the Staffy will be the centre of a new animated series chronicling their unlikely friendship. title: A-list star ‘not paid’ for hit movie
content: The Deadpool franchise has become a huge hit at the box office, but once actor sadly didn’t benefit at all from its success. The success of 2016’s Deadpool was not a foregone conclusion. content: The wheelchair sport champion and advocate hopes his latest venture will celebrate and normalise disability among young children. title: ‘Legend’: Stars react as Biden exits
content: Stars have shared their thoughts on President Joe Biden’s surprise call to drop out of the presidential race, with one predicting the US is in for a “wild” ride.
